lines.text: I've never seen a... pilgrim... who could use a staff the way you did.
Ah, but sir; all pilgrims share a deep love of life; especially their own!

the eagle]
I have my eyes...

Dar... the gods have put that mark on you, and someday, you'll find out why. 'Til then, this mark will be your guide. My sword and my caber will be your trusted companions. Protect Emur, your home. And if anything should happen to me, look for our enemies, the Juns... and you may search for your destiny in the Valley of Aruk.
[Dar grabs Kiri from behind as she fearfully looks at Ruh]
Don't move. The beast is fierce. But if we show no fear, we might escape.
Will you help us to free my father?
Send your cousin over to ask me.
[Tal whispers to Kiri, who smiles knowingly before going to Dar]
What can I do to convince you to help us?
I'm very busy. The rescue will take some time. I...
[Kiri smiles and leans over, kissing Dar]
I think he's gonna help us.

[chuckles]
I have a feeling he might.
